events.entities: AT&T Data Breach Related to Layoffs
events.eventSummary: There is a report of a data breach related to AT&T layoffs.
Users are reporting a scammer group on Telegram.
Users are reporting that their accounts have been hacked.

There are reports of an incident where no confidential or proprietary data was downloaded, copied, or redistributed, and sensitive details were redacted from attached screenshots. More details about this incident, ESIX impact score, and additional context are available on HackRisk.io.

dailyBrief: Today's cyber landscape featured significant threats, including a high-severity data breach related to AT&T layoffs and widespread account hacks targeting Crypto.com users. Additionally, a medium-severity scam group was reported active on Telegram, while one incident involved no direct data loss. The day reflects high alertness with coordinated attacks and scams impacting both large organizations and individual users.
